"Oh, uh... Take care, okay?": "There are so many people here. So many things to see, I'm almost dizzy. I wonder why, it's so much fun."
"I don't remember much of the past, but for some reason it doesn't worry me. ...I wonder why?"
"I know I've seen everyone gathered around like this before, but it all feels fresh to me. ...I'm enjoying just watching."
"Sometimes I have dreams. I don't remember what happens in them, but they're strange dreams. They're kind of frightening, familiar..."

"Welcome back, <%me>.
Working hard as usual, I see. Yep, working hard."
"I was lucky to be rescued, but I can't help but wonder if there are more out there like me."
"If there are... I kind of feel bad that I was the only one saved."
"Being an ARKS member looks tough, but everyone looks so lively, I'm really jealous. I hope I can stand by their side one day."
"Me? I'm not bored at all. I have you and lots of other people to talk to."

"I wonder what I'll do once I get better.
...Just as a goal, I mean. Just thinking about it helps me keep going."
"ARKS members always seem to be so well dressed. I wish I had something nicer to wear..."
"Hmm... I wonder why I don't have much memories left, but I feel so liberated right now."
"I wonder whether there wasn't much I could do in my past life, and I was suffocating because of it? If that's the case maybe this is happiness."
"Do you know where they get all the data they put up on that big monitor? It's such a mystery, its construct and all."
"I heard the ARKS ship has been in space for over 200 years. Why do you think it set off in the first place?"
"Were they just seeking adventure? I can't seem to find any history on what happened before that."
"Photons are in the air all around us, right?"
"It's weird that some people are in tune with them and others aren't, even though they're everywhere."
"I really enjoy reading books and data. I can't make any rigorous movements so I'll read anything I can get my hands on."
"When you compare two accounts of the same thing you sometimes get totally different perspectives. It's fascinating."
"Oh, welcome back. Or is it good morning?"
"Ha ha. You ARKS members work such irregular hours, I have no idea what to say sometimes. Let's make it \"Good Morning\"!"
"Is everything all right? Are you not overworking yourself? You can't hide it from me, you know. You have a scary expression on your face. Please please look after yourself, okay?"

"Oh... <%me>.
Um, take care of yourself, okay? For some reason I have a feeling something bad is going to happen."

"Everything feels so sad...
I can sense it in the Photons around here. What happened?"
"The air around here feels so light. Maybe it's everyone's positive energy? Ha ha. I like it."
"<%me>. Um, are you... okay? There's been nothing but trouble lately, so I've been worried."
"If I'm imagining it all, that's fine. But don't take it all in by yourself, okay?"
"When you're having a tough time, you should just say so? If you don't, no one will realize and you'll be all alone..."

"Ah... <%me>.
Did you find that dragon you were looking for?"

"I heard that it was on a rampage. But why did it rampage in the first place?
...I wonder what happened."
"...I've got a really bad feeling about this. Please take care of yourself, I mean, really."
"It seems like they're going to broadcast that Battle-Skills Tournament we talked about before."
"So, how do I put this...? I want to watch you in battle, <%me>."
"I'm just genuinely interested, but I feel I were to watch, I'd might be able to remember something"

"<%me>.
Your face is all stiff. Are you okay? Did something happen?"

"If it's nothing, that's fine...
But you shouldn't take on so much on your own."

"<%me>...
I'm okay. I'm actually so calm that I'm quite surprised myself."
"I believe in Xion. Especially since Xion was smiling at you."
"...Oh, you didn't see that? No, it was nothing like that. Xion was definitely smiling."
"No one really talked about Xion at all. I feel like everyone would get too worried about him..."
"So let's keep the stuff about Xion between you and me. Our little secret. Okay?"
"...hehe, this kinda nostalgic, interacting like this."
"<%me>. It's so tense!"
"Not you, but our surroundings. What is it, what's going on? I feel like something is changing."

"<%me>, are you alright?
You're not wound up in something weird, are you?"
"I feel like you've got this cold air about you. I'm hoping it's not anything in particular..."

"Oh, <%me>.
Yeah, I'm physically okay."

"Philia took away my weapons saying I shouldn't overdo it...
But really, I'm physically fine."

"...I guess this is all thanks to Xion.
...Xion."
"Heheh, I'm glad. Because from now on, I can go on missions with you."
"<%me>, it would make me really happy if I could help you out."
"Let's work hard to protect everyone together."
"I don't know why I have to keep going through these checkups. I feel perfectly fine right now..."
"...I know. It's important to go through with them. Philia will tell me off if I don't."

"It's because everyone's worried about me.
...OK. If they tell me to do it, I'll do it."
